para.text: The four standing committees of the Commission are:
The Committee on Capital and Operational Funding;
The Committee on Hospital and Community Health Resources Relations;
The Committee on School-Based Community Health Clinic Center Expansion; and
The Committee on Data Information Systems.
Committee Appointment. The chair shall appoint commissioners to serve on the standing committees annually, at the first regularly scheduled Commission meeting of each fiscal year.
Vacancies. The chair may appoint commissioners to fill vacancies on the committees at any time.
The Commission may establish one or more ad hoc committees to assist in performing duties of the Commission.
An ad hoc committee established pursuant to §A of this regulation shall:
Limit its activities to the purpose for which it was formed; and
Be dissolved when the purpose for which it was formed has been satisfied or abandoned by the Commission.
